Name: Safari Venture
About the game: Zoologist Erwin, founder of the 'SERENGETI â€“ FOR A BETTER LIFE' initiative, and his team of rangers need your help! Only if you manage to place all stones correctly in this colourful African-themed Match 3 game, you'll be able to master all the challenges of Safari Venture and save the animals of the Serengeti from an evil gang of poachers. Puzzle your way through 8 exciting chapters and solve over 100 challenging Match 3 levels. Spectacular power-ups and African rhythms create lots of excitement and real safari atmosphere! 105 challenging Match 3 levels Exciting story spanning 8 chapters Bonus mini games Spectacular Power-Ups Several levels of difficulty Free the animals from captivity
